metadata.Title: CVE-2017-8816 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The NTLM authentication feature in curl and libcurl before 7.57.0 on 32-bitplatforms allows attackers to cause a denial of service (integer overflowand resultant buffer overflow, and application crash) or possibly haveunspecified other impact via vectors involving long user and passwordfields.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-8816` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.5
libcurl3 - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.5
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.5
libcurl3-nss - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.5
No subscription required

criterions.comment: curl package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.47.0-1ubuntu2.5').
